title: [TinyTAN | ANIMATION] - Dream ON
author: BANGTANTV
description:
Keep your Dream ON, it will make a happier tomorrow

TinyTAN inspired by BTS
https://twitter.com/TinyTANofficial

Creative : Big Hit IP 
 
Director : Moohyun Jang 
Chief Producer : Sejung Ha 
Producer : Yoon A Ko 
CG Supervisor : Min Kyu Lee 
 
Line Producer : Soohyun Lee, Jeayoon Lee 
Assistant Director / Editor : Gyungjin Kim 
Storyboards : Ha Yan Park 
 
Production Design Lead: Kibin Kim 
Character Design : Hye Lim Chun, Yeobeen Yun 
Set / Prop Design : Sugeun Eom, Yeobeen Yun, Sungho Lee, Youngjun Jeon, Juhyeon Han, Rosa GiHun Houng
Color Keys: Minjeong Choe 
Matte Painting: Hyoju Ban, Rosa GiHun Houng 
 
Modeling / Look Development Leads : Youngsam Kim, Yeree Kim, Hyunsub Kim, Hongseok Kim 
Layout / Animation Leads : Joongho Kum, Sunghee Cho, Sohyun Cho 
Character TD (Rig / Chr. FX) : Hun Back, Mina Choi 
FX: Jae Lyun Lee
Lighting / Compositing Leads: Jung Sun Kim, Ji Sub Park, Seo Hyun Jang, Hannah Jang, Seonil Hong 
Pipeline TD : Jonghwan Moon, Sangjin Lee 
 
Co-production : Goldframe / 302Planet / Lennon / Primetime Music

#TinyTAN #타이니탄
